version_description:
Hurray, Mayor! A few pretty useful updates are waiting for you in the latest version! Hurry up to check them out:

• You can now save your city and gain achievements via the GameCenter;
• You’ll never miss a message from neighbor with the new vibration alert (for iPhone 7);
• We’ve made a little improvement: the Store now shows the exact time of the buildings’ work;
• And new wonderful music and sounds will inspire you all the way while building the city of your dream!

Enjoy playing!

We’re happy to introduce new game version, Mayor! What’s waiting for you:

• Fixes to some minor bugs. The game works even better now!

Hurry up to update and enjoy playing!

Hurray, Mayor! SuperCity is now available in the whole world! Go on and dip into amazing adventures that just cannot wait for you! Including:

- Our characters’ new appearance! Check the guys out
- Lots of fascinating quests in two beautiful locations for newcomers!

Welcome to the city of your dreams!

Hurray, Mayor! SuperCity is now available in the whole world! Go on and dip into amazing adventures that just cannot wait for you! Including:

- Our characters’ new appearance! Check the guys out
- Lots of fascinating quests in two beautiful locations for newcomers!

Welcome to the city of your dreams!

The changes waiting for you are just stunning!

First and foremost, new Infrastructure buildings:

• Your citizens are fizzing with the desire to learn the city’s latest news! Build the Post Office and TV Center to keep them in the swim!

Some adornments:

• Professor and Captain have got a new look!
• Airport and Water Park are now even lovelier as well!

Slight changes to SuperBINGO:

• BINGO quests have become more exciting!

The game works even better now:

• Game optimization!
• Fix to recommended friends!
• Fixes to missing friends, new friends not appearing, and requests for items!

Have a great time playing!

The changes waiting for you are just stunning!

First and foremost, new Infrastructure buildings:

• Your citizens are fizzing with the desire to learn the city’s latest news! Build the Post Office and TV Center to keep them in the swim!

The game works even better now:

• Game optimization!
• Fix to recommended friends!
• Fixes to missing friends, new friends not appearing, and requests for items!

Have a great time playing!

Halloween is coming! A dark force is rising, to… decorate Supercity!
Help the Professor conduct his Mad Experiment and win the grand prize — 500 superbucks!
Renew your city for the upcoming holiday with the new items!

Try out the new interface:
Check out the “Friends” window!
Making friends is even easier now — just send them a link to your profile!
Construction has got much easier!

New game mechanics:
Limits for some buildings have been reduced. The buildings that already expand the limit will be available for your use.

All Hallows’ Eve is upon us! It’s time to experiment!

Halloween is coming! A dark force is rising, to… decorate Supercity!
Help the Professor conduct his Mad Experiment and win the grand prize — 500 superbucks!
Renew your city for the upcoming holiday with the new items!

Try out the new interface:
Check out the “Friends” window!
Making friends is even easier now — just send them a link to your profile!
Construction has got much easier!

New game mechanics:
Limits for some buildings have been reduced. The buildings that already expand the limit will be available for your use.

All Hallows’ Eve is upon us! It’s time to experiment!

Autumn is coming to a close, it's time to prepare for the Harvest Festival!

Check out the improvements to the interface:
* Now it's no longer possible to accidentally spend currency: the game now has a long-awaited Superbucks confirmation button!

Try out the balance changes:
* We've reconsidered the amount of experience needed to level up.
* Quests now give more experience!
* The list of items dropped from residential buildings has been changed. Check out the new tips!
* The production time of some residential buildings has been changed but on the other hand they now produce more coins! You can now spend less energy to make more profit!
* Changes were made to the limit on several buildings. Now you can build slightly fewer of them. Buildings that have already been built will keep working as they did before!

Complete a new quest:
* Help Alice prepare a home feast and get various lovely gifts!

Happy Thanksgiving!

Autumn is coming to a close, it's time to prepare for the Harvest Festival!

Check out the improvements to the interface:
* Now it's no longer possible to accidentally spend currency: the game now has a long-awaited Superbucks confirmation button!

Try out the balance changes:
* We've reconsidered the amount of experience needed to level up.
* Quests now give more experience!
* The list of items dropped from residential buildings has been changed. Check out the new tips!
* The production time of some residential buildings has been changed but on the other hand they now produce more coins! You can now spend less energy to make more profit!
* Changes were made to the limit on several buildings. Now you can build slightly fewer of them. Buildings that have already been built will keep working as they did before!

Complete a new quest:
* Help Alice prepare a home feast and get various lovely gifts!

Happy Thanksgiving!

Greet the Winter with SuperCity
* Celebrate the New Year with new characters.
* Help your city residents decorate a Christmas tree, and it will bring you energy until the end of January!

What's New
* New Infrastructure building: Art Gallery
* More tickets for the Wheel of Fortune
* More ways to get energy for free

Happy New Year!

Magnificent News!
* From now on, the game will take up TWO times less space on your phone!
* Holiday Bingo: Receive special New Year’s prizes and decorate your city!

Greet the Winter with SuperCity
* Celebrate the New Year with new characters.
* Help your city residents decorate a Christmas tree, and it will bring you energy until the end of January!

What's New
* New Infrastructure building: Art Gallery
* More coupons for the Wheel of Fortune
* More ways to get energy for free

Happy New Year!

Magnificent News!
* From now on, the game will take up TWO times less space on your phone!
* Holiday Bingo: Receive special New Year’s prizes and decorate your city!

Greet the Winter with SuperCity
* Celebrate the New Year with new characters.
* Help your city residents decorate a Christmas tree, and it will bring you energy until the end of January!

What's New
* New Infrastructure building: Art Gallery
* More coupons for the Wheel of Fortune
* More ways to get energy for free

Happy New Year!

Magical update!

Celebrate St. Valentine's day! Show yourself some love with new buildings and decor.
Take part in the holiday quests from February 5 and get the Romantic Palace!

Celebrate the Spring Festival with your citizens in SuperCity!
Find out how your city's residents celebrate Chinese New Year and help them prepare for the celebrations!
Win prizes and get new buidings.

Also:
* The Wheel of Fortune has been improved.

There are new territories available in the city center!
Take up Sea Trade with the Captain and get the valuable resources you need to clear the new territories for construction!
Spring is coming to the city and it's bringing Spring-themed events:
* Get new Spring facades for residential buildings.
* Dive into a St. Patrick's Day adventure with the Leprechaun!
* Join in with the Festival of Colors with your citizens.

Join us ringing in a fresh new Spring!

Spring is here!

Find the Leprechaun's pot o' gold:
* Try your luck at the new BINGO
* Get new buildings and decor
* Follow the rainbow from March 16!

Celebrate Easter with your citizens:
* Learn how the residents of SuperCity prepare for the festivities and help them organize the events!
* Start organizing the Easter fair in your city from March 22.

As per your requests:
* Giving and getting gifts is now simpler.
* Laying roads is easier.
Also:
* Complete more quests, hear more stories, get more rewards!

The time has come to decorate your city with flowers and petals!
* Take part at the special BINGO from April the 18th and get a beautiful Orangerie.
* Start building a French Quarter from May the 4th!
* Participate in all of the upcoming events to get the Wishing Flower, Venus Park and Confectionary.

* Try out the new Boosters - a reward for the most active players!
* You can now see your reward in the quest window.
* The friend limit was increased.

Update your game and get some Superbucks!

Ring in the Summer!
There's a new event — The Beach Party! Available from June 1!
Prepare for the Super Cup from June 15 and win a new kind of Stadium.
At the end of June you'll get a fun new quest — "Lady Liberty" is coming to town!
Give your city a makeover with new decor from the store!

As requested, we added a new mode so you can move small objects around easily!
Discuss the latest in-game events on our BRAND NEW FORUM! Take a look in Settings!

Update your game and get some Superbucks!

Ring in the Summer!
There's a new event — The Beach Party! Available from June 1!
Prepare for the Super Cup from June 15 and win a new kind of Stadium.
At the end of June you'll get a fun new quest — "Lady Liberty" is coming to town!
Give your city a makeover with new decor from the store!

As requested, we added a new mode so you can move small objects around easily!
Discuss the latest in-game events on our BRAND NEW FORUM! Take a look in Settings!

The most exiting events are hapening amidst the summer!

Each Mayor now has his own City Journal!
* Get stickers for the most important landmarks of your city
* Earn unique rewards for completing the journal
* Gather the ultimate collection of stickers!

The holidays continue!
* Start to build your own theme park from July the 6th
* Celebrate the game's birthday during the event helt from the 19th of July

Also:
* The new reward window

The most exiting events are hapening amidst the summer!

Each Mayor now has his own City Journal!
* Get stickers for the most important landmarks of your city
* Earn unique rewards for completing the journal
* Gather the ultimate collection of stickers!

The holidays continue!
Celebrate the game's birthday during the event helt from the 19th of July

Also:
* The error which caused the game to stop loading at 97% is fixed
* The new reward window

Kick off September with the most fashionable event of the year:

Help Sophie organize a Fashion Show in your city:
* Help your citizens and get a unique building - the Fashion podium.
* Compete with other mayors and win the Fashion Cup!

By players' request:
* The game is getting an ornate Italian Fountain!
* Complete an exciting new quest chain to get it!
* The prizes in Wheel of Fortune have been changed!

October's gonna be fright-taa-a-astic!

There's a Halloween-themed shop, music and a load of new quests!
New buildings and decor are coming!
Help Carolina deal with the eerie outbreak of ghosts!
Enter a new contest and compete for unique cups!

Have a wild Halloween!

More new events in your city!

Try your luck in Scratch-cards! The event will begin on the 29th of October!
Decorate your city for the upcoming Diwali holiday from the 4th of November!
Celebrating the Singles day together! Incredible sales!
New buildings and decor for your city!

New stories are waiting for you!

Tis almost the season!

Winter is floating ever closer to SuperCity, join your citizens in getting ready for a bit of cold weather and a lot of fun!
Samantha is coming back to visit with her trusty helpers, the Elves.
Get new buildings and decorations in the Christmas events!

Also:
Meet your city's newest residents: Lee and Ramona.
New infrastructure and buildings available at the shop!

Merry Christmas, Mayor!

There are new territories available in the city center!
Take up Sea Trade with the Captain and get the valuable resources you need to clear the new territories for construction!

* Get new Spring facades for residential buildings.

Join us ringing in a fresh new Spring!

It's adventure time!

Head off on an archaeological journey with Victor Rich starting April 29:
Find hidden treasure in the all new Search for the Lost Temple event!
Buy new houses in the Archaeological Findings Shop.

It's almost summer!
The mysterious Genie is planning a visit to your city. Get ready to welcome him!
Have fun with your citizens at the huge Medieval Festival!
Play our new events and win rare prizes!

Fixes:
Property on the edge doesn't disappear anymore!

Fixes:
Property on the edge doesn't disappear anymore!

Summer is sizzling in the tropics!

Go on a new expedition with Lee this July:
* Repair the research facilities on the tropical islands.
* Find blueprints for new buildings and decor!

What's more:
* New areas have been added to the south-east of yoru city's center!
* Celebrate the game's birthday with your city's residents.
* Tropical facades to summer-ify your city will arrive in August!

Autumn's here!

Get gorgeous new landmarks in exciting quests!
There's new infrastructureavailable from 17/9.
And from October, there are gonna be some spooky-spoopy Halloween events!

We've improved the game's stability:
There are fewer errors now.
Various bugs and issues have been fixed.

Halloween is lurking just round the corner! Prepare for a scare! "Ghost Hunt" is our grand new event!
Join Carolina on a spooooky adventure:
* Discover and decorate new tenoorary locations near your city.
* Catch ghosts to climb up the ratings!
* Compete with other Mayors and get unique cups!
Also:
* New buildings are coming to the shop at the end of October!
* Build new infrastructure in the first days of November.
* And other exciting events await!

Grand update
Go on an adventure with no time limit!
Aliens have crash-landed and request your help.
Go on a rescue mission with Carolina!
Learn the whole story in the city's three new areas!

Also:
Hold a festive celebration in your city by taking part in the new events!
Get new Christmas buildings and decor.

Follow the rainbow, Mayor!
The following is waiting for you in March:
A new journey with the Captain.
Adventures are now less complex, so it's easier to get the prizes!

Also:
Spring is coming to the city, get ready for new lotteries!
Plenty of new events!
Get new holiday buildings and decorations.

Check out the new update: Super City National Park!
A completely new location is already waiting for you in the game!
New expeditions available for playing at all times!
New buildings - Animal enclosures.
Create your own reserve by collecting all the animals!

Summer is just around the corner, get ready for new lotteries!
Lots of new events!
Get new festive buildings and decorations!

Season activities are ready and waiting for you!
Just enjoy playing SuperCity and get additional prizes!
New unique buildings and decor every month.
The number of prizes depends on your activity!

Also:
Buy a Gold Ticket to double prizes in season activities!
Plenty of new events!
Get new holiday buildings and decor.
Explore Provence with Mike!

Thank you for staying with SuperCity, Mayor!
The following is waiting for you in October:
Adventures are now less complex, so it is easier to get the prizes!

Also:
Autumn is coming to the City, get ready for new lotteries!
Plenty of new events!
Get new holiday buildings and decorations!

Thank you for playing SuperCity! This release brings bug fixes and performance improvements. We hope your experience with the app will be better, rate us or leave a comment, we will be happy to hear your opinion!
